sys_hub_action_instance_v2.comment: Update request item stage to [Request Approved]
Update requested item state to [Open]
Using the Sys_id to look up the requested item.
Update Requested item state to [Open]
Update requested item stage to [Requested Approved]
Ask Test Admin to do fulfillment
Send a Email to Requester and cc manager. Ask Requester to Modify.
Send a email to requester and cc manager. Ask requester to modify.
Ask Test Admin to do fulfillment
Ask manager for approval.
Ask manager for approval.
Update the request item state to [Closed Complete]
Send a Email to requester and cc manager, tell them the request has completed.
Wait the requester to modify the request and the requester set the requested item state to [Work in Progress],and request again
Wait requester resubmit again.

sys_hub_flow_logic_instance_v2.comment: If the request is returned by Test Admin

sys_hub_action_instance_v2.comment: Update the request item state to [Closed Complete]
Send a Email to requester and cc manager, tell them the request has completed.
Using the Sys_id to look up the requested item.
Wait the requester to modify the request and the requester set the requested item state to [Work in Progress],and request again
Update Requested item state to [Open]
Ask Test Admin to do fulfillment
Update requested item state to [Open]
Update request item stage to [Request Approved]
Send a email to requester and cc manager. Ask requester to modify.
Ask manager for approval.
Ask Test Admin to do fulfillment
Send a Email to Requester and cc manager. Ask Requester to Modify.
Ask manager for approval.
Wait requester resubmit again.
Update requested item stage to [Requested Approved]
